fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm startup Net Message appears on LCD
fields.request_details:
1. Restart a control node with the LCD screen enabled and wait for services to come up.
2. Check Nodes â†’ Net Messages in the admin and confirm a new entry with the hostname:port subject and version body was created at startup.
3. Inspect the physical LCD and verify the same subject/body is rendered after boot.
4. Clear the Net Message and restart again to ensure the startup notification is re-created and displayed.
